name: Blackberry Kush
description: This mostly indica strain is a mix of Afghani and Blackberry strains and has beautiful dark purple buds with orange hairs. Plants will flower at 7-8 weeks and are not particularly high yielders, but the dense, hard nugs have crystals throughout. Blackberry Kush tends to have a hashy, jet fuel smell and taste that is balanced by sweet berries. Blackberry Kush is often recommended for the treatment of pain thanks to its strong indica body effects.Â
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Happy, Euphoric, Hungry, Stress, Pain, Insomnia, Depression, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Paranoid, Anxious
